verses.name: Joshua 13:1
verses.text: Now Joshua was old and stricken in years; and the Lord said unto him, Thou art old and stricken in years, and there remaineth yet very much land to be possessed.

verses.name: Joshua 13:2
verses.text: This is the land that yet remaineth: all the borders of the Philistines, and all Geshuri,

verses.name: Joshua 13:3
verses.text: From Sihor, which is before Egypt, even unto the borders of Ekron northward, which is counted to the Canaanite: five lords of the Philistines; the Gazathites, and the Ashdothites, the Eshkalonites, the Gittites, and the Ekronites; also the Avites:
